definition: Relating to the north or the northern regions.
exampleSentence: The Aurora Borealis is a stunning natural light display.

definition: A deep gorge, typically one with a river flowing through it, as found in North America.
exampleSentence: We hiked to the bottom of the grand canyon.

definition: A constantly changing pattern or sequence of elements.
exampleSentence: The garden was a kaleidoscope of colors in spring.

definition: A massive and extremely remote celestial object emitting exceptionally large amounts of energy.
exampleSentence: Astronomers discovered a new quasar millions of light-years away.

definition: Attractively brilliant and impressive in appearance.
exampleSentence: The queen looked resplendent in her jeweled gown.
